## üåê About Andromeda - WhatsApp Bot

Andromeda is a bot multifunctional capable of multitasking using the Whatsapp Web as a means to communicate with the bot

## ‚≠êÔ∏è Features

- ‚úÖ Automated messages
- ‚úÖ Configuration language
- ‚úÖ Possibility to dev/add third party modules
- ‚úÖ Hidden browser
- ‚úÖ Google Search
- ‚úÖ Working in all OS
- ‚ûñ Scrapping Web
- ‚ûñ Send Photos
- ‚ûñ Send Voice note
- ‚ûñ Alerts to cryptocurrency
